articles.content: Team India had a disappointing outing on Tuesday as they crashed to a defeat against Australia in the first T20I, losing by four wickets in Mohali. Chasing a target of 209 runs, Australia raced to 21… [+1638 chars]

articles.title: John McEnroe puts perfect end to GOAT debate on Federer, Nadal and Djokovic - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The three won 62 of the last 76 Grand Slams in men's tennis with Nadal (22) leading the Slam list followed by Djokovic (21) and Federer (20). And ahead of the latter's final ATP tournament of his career, tennis legend McEnroe put a perfect end to the long-sta…
articles.content: There is and will never be an end to the discussion on who is the Greatest of All Time (GOAT) in tennis. From John McEnroe, Bjorn Borg, Andre Agassi, Pete Sampras the discussion had shifted to the tr… [+1708 chars]
